errors.error_description: Added incorrect system dependency installation command and forced specific version of mysqlclient without proper context
correction_candidates: Remove the installation instructions and refer users to the official installation documentation
Install system dependencies with `brew install mysql` on macOS and use `pip install django-mysql` without version pinning
Use `apt-get install default-libmysqlclient-dev` and install with `pip install django-mysql` allowing automatic dependency resolution
Install with conda using `conda install django-mysql` and avoid manual system dependency management
errors.golden_answer: Remove the installation instructions and refer users to the official installation documentation

errors.error_description: Pinned mysqlclient to a specific version without explaining compatibility requirements or supported version ranges
correction_candidates: Specify supported Python versions and compatible mysqlclient version ranges in the requirements section
Remove version pinning and let pip resolve compatible versions automatically
Add a compatibility matrix showing which versions work together
Use version ranges like mysqlclient>=2.0.0,<3.0.0 instead of exact pinning
errors.golden_answer: Remove version pinning and let pip resolve compatible versions automatically
